meta.expr:content: data:blog.pageName + ", keyword 1, keyword 2, keyword 3, keyword 4, keyword 5"
meta.name: keywords

div.span: skip to main | skip to sidebar

b:widget-settings.b:widget-setting: <form action="/search" id="searchthis" method="get" style="display: inline;"> <input id="search-box" name="q" size="30" style="height:24px;" type="text" /> <input id="search-btn" type="submit" value="Search" /></form>

b:widget.title: Navbar
